questions.title: Why do programmers prefer dark mode?

answers.title: Because it's easier on the eyes
Because light attracts bugs
Because they don't like to see their mistakes
Because it makes them look mysterious

questions.title: Why was the JavaScript developer sad?

answers.title: Because he couldn't find his semicolon
Because he got stuck in an infinite loop
Because his code kept returning undefined
Because he didn't Node how to Express himself
Because it has too many bugs
Because they can't debug the trees
Because it doesn't have Wi-Fi
Because it's not user-friendly

questions.title: Why did the programmer go broke?

answers.title: Because he spent all his money on RAM
Because he spent too much time in the cloud
Because he used up all his cache
Because he couldn't find any bits to eat

questions.title: Why do programmers always mix up Halloween and Christmas?

answers.title: Because 31 OCT equals 25 DEC
Because they both involve lots of sugar and caffeine
Because they can't differentiate between their arrays
Because they get lost in the maze of dates.
